== Create Jira Repository ==

# Right Click on Repository View And invoke "New Task Repository..." and it will open wizard to select Repository Connector Type (Local,[GSJiraRepository Jira] etc...). 
Select Jira Repository and go Next > . 

       [http://cubeon.googlecode.com/svn/images/selectRepoTypeJira.PNG]

# Add a Repository Configuration  and click Finish.

Note :you can connect to jira base on project wise or repository wise.Ex: http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/TST or http://jira.atlassian.com/ (this is really useful when working with large repository like http://jira.codehaus.org/ to prevent cache only relevant information locally ).
  * To test drive Jira Connector You can connect to public repository at jira.atlassian.com
